description: The **UI width responsive** component is a utility that represents an extension of the default UI width component, providing responsive breakpoint-based classes for widths on elements in the screen layout grid as viewport sizing changes. (See also, related components: UI width)
name: UI Width Responsive
usage:
There is no need to learn all names by heart, but rather learn how the class names are built so that you can use the right class when needed. ```html
```
